text: Giorgios Tsifoutis (; born 14 October 1968) is a retired Greek football midfielder. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Greek footballers Category:Greek football managers Category:Panserraikos F.C. players Category:Panathinaikos F.C. players Category:OFI Crete F.C. players Category:Ethnikos Piraeus F.C. players Category:Xanthi F.C. players Category:Panetolikos F.C. players Category:GAS Ialysos 1948 F.C. players Category:Levadiakos F.C. players Category:Kavala F.C. players Category:Aiolikos F.C. players Category:Super League Greece players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Greece international footballers Category:Panserraikos F.C. managers
title: Giorgos Tsifoutis
